Zeratul.name: Cleave
Zeratul.description: Deal 200 (+4% per level) damage to nearby enemies.

Zeratul.name: Singularity Spike
Zeratul.description: Flings a Singularity Spike that sticks to the first enemy hit. Deals 228 (+4% per level) damage after 1 second and slows the enemy by 40% for 3 seconds.

Zeratul.name: Blink
Zeratul.description: Teleport to the target location.   Using this Ability does not break cloak.

Zeratul.name: Shadow Assault
Zeratul.description: Your Basic Attacks cause you to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 4 seconds.

Zeratul.name: Void Prison
Zeratul.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, making allies and enemies invulnerable and unable to act for 5 seconds. You are not affected.

Zeratul.name: Permanent Cloak
Zeratul.description: Gain Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds.  Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or channeling reveals you.

1.name: Greater Cleave
1.description: Increases the radius of Cleave by 33%.

1.name: Shadow Hunter
1.description: Quest: Gather Regeneration Globes to lower the Mana cost of Blink by 2.  Reward: Upon gathering 20 Regeneration Globes, Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Blink by 1 second.

1.name: Vorpal Blade
1.description: Activate to teleport to the last non-structure target attacked within 3 seconds. The target is revealed during these 3 seconds.

4.name: Combo Slash
4.description: After using an Ability, Zeratul's next Basic Attack within 6 seconds deals 40% additional damage.

4.name: Grim Task
4.description: Quest: Hero Takedowns increase Ability Power by 5%, up to 50%. This bonus Ability Power is lost on death.

4.name: Rending Cleave
4.description: Cleave deals an additional 40% damage over 3 seconds.

7.name: Seeker in the Dark
7.description: Singularity Spike takes 50% longer to explode. It can be reactivated to teleport to the target, granting 30% increased Move Speed for 3 seconds.

7.name: Slip into Shadow
7.description: Blink gains an additional charge, but its cooldown is increased by 8 seconds.

7.name: Wormhole
7.description: For 2.125 seconds, reactivate Blink to return to the point where it was cast from.

10.name: Shadow Assault
10.description: Basic Attacks cause Zeratul to charge at enemies and have 20% increased Attack Speed. Lasts for 4 seconds.

10.name: Void Prison
10.description: Slows time in an area to a near standstill, making allies and enemies invulnerable and unable to act for 5 seconds. Zeratul is not affected.

13.name: Mending Strikes
13.description: Basic Attacks heal for 35% of the damage dealt.

13.name: Shroud of Adun
13.description: Zeratul gains a shield equal to 15% of his Maximum Health over 5 seconds while under Permanent Cloak.

13.name: Spell Shield
13.description: Every 30 seconds, gain 50 Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for 1.5 seconds, reducing the damage taken by 50%. Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

16.name: Master Warp-Blade
16.description: Every third consecutive Basic Attack against the same target deals 125% bonus damage.

16.name: Sentenced to Death
16.description: Deal 40% increased damage to enemies while they have a Singularity Spike attached to them.

16.name: Void Slash
16.description: If Cleave hits more than one enemy Hero, it deals 50% increased damage and its cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds.

20.name: Gift of the Xel'naga
20.description: Allies are no longer affected by Void Prison, and enemies are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds once Void Prison ends.

20.name: Nerazim Fury
20.description: Shadow Assault grants 30% Life Steal, and the duration is increased by 50%.

20.name: Nexus Blades
20.description: Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by 20% for 1 second.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
